arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic’s owners told their football club is now a ‘different animal’
arts.sum: Nathan Jones reckons that Charlton Athletic’s owners now have a revitalised football club on their hands – compared to the state of affairs when he walked into The Valley. Charlton will be in the League One play-offs at the end of the season with the victory this afternoon guaranteeing a top-six finish.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic boss Jones on clinching League One play-off place
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic manager Nathan Jones says he has “immense pride” now that they have secured a League One play-off place. “It gives you immense pride to get to the point we have now because you have to have strength and belief,” said Jones, who was appointed in January 2024 with Charlton in danger of relegation.

arts.ttl: Charlton seal play-off spot with win over Northampton
‘He is fine’ – Nathan Jones shares positive Charlton Athletic selection update pre-Northampton Town clash

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic boss not taking any risky approach with vice-captain Lloyd Jones
arts.sum: But sometimes you have to ask if the short-term gain is at the longer-term risk and that is what Lloyd was. So when Lloyd picked up something there is no point risking him in the real short term when it could have a long-term affect.”

arts.ttl: Preview: Charlton Athletic vs. Northampton Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's League One clash between Charlton Athletic and Northampton Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
